entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
